title: Sei Network Emerges as Latest Crypto Favorite; Meme Coin SEIYAN Leads Bets
description: Meme coin SEIYAN – apparently a cult term for holders  of the SEI token – has gained 400% in the past week, serving as a proxy for the growth of the broader Sei ecosystem.

title: Orbit Chain confirms hack estimated at $81M
description:
Orbit Chain, a cross-chain platform, announced in an X message on Jan. 1 that it suffered an attack on the previous day. The project wrote that it confirmed “unidentified access” to its bridge platform late on Dec. 31. Orbit Chain said it is engaging with international law enforcement. It said it is working with the […]

The post Orbit Chain confirms hack estimated at $81M appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Crypto Market Could Boom In 2024, Predicts Goldman Sachs
description: Goldman Sachs has predicted that the crypto market will grow considerably in 2024 with the influx of traditional financial institutions.

title: The Rise of Human Quandary in Post-OpenAI Controversy
description: In the aftermath of Sam Altman’s unexpected return to OpenAI, investor Vinod Khosla’s critique sheds light on the “errant” behavior of the board, redirecting the discourse from the anticipated AI uprising to the more imminent threat of human hubris. The clash between techno-optimists and techno-pessimists takes center stage as Khosla reveals the irrationality and faith-based […]

title: LungLife AI’s Shares Surge by 43% After Successful Validation of Lung Cancer Diagnostic
description: In a significant development, LungLife AI Inc (AIM: LLAI), a pioneer in diagnostic solutions for early lung cancer detection, experienced a substantial surge in its shares, with prices jumping by a staggering 43%. The remarkable spike came on the heels of the successful validation of LungLife AI’s LungLB test, a vital tool in the detection […]

title: Bitcoin ETF by BlackRock Nearing Approval; Arbitrum & Rebel Satoshi $RBLZ Draw Fresh Funding.
description: The crypto world is buzzing with anticipation as BlackRock’s revised Bitcoin ETF proposal inches closer to regulatory approval. With its updated cash creation and redemption mechanisms, BlackRock seems to have addressed the Securities and Exchange Commission’s (SEC) primary concerns. If approved, this could open doors for a broader range of investors to tap into the [...]

title: Bitcoin Miners Behind Bars: 1,314 Rigs Confiscated in Indonesian Electricity Theft Crackdown
description: Indonesia has broken the operations of illegal Bitcoin miners with 1,314 rigs. Bitcoin mining efforts is tightening amongst key players in the industry. In a move against the growth of illegal crypto mining operations, Indonesian authorities have cracked down on Bitcoin miners engaged in electricity theft.  Details of the Indonesian Bitcoin Miners Crackdown As highlighted [...]

title: Pepe (PEPE) and Dogecoin (DOGE) vs. Retik Finance (RETIK): Do the memes stand any chance against utility?
description: The cryptocurrency landscape is a complex and ever-changing one, with new developments occurring all the time.
